Package oshi.hardware.common

Provides abstract classes for common code
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBaseboard
    Baseboard data
    AbstractCentralProcessor
    A CPU.
    AbstractComputerSystem
    Computer System data.
    AbstractDisplay
    A Display
    AbstractFirmware
    Firmware data.
    AbstractGlobalMemory
    Memory info.
    AbstractHardwareAbstractionLayer
    Common fields or methods used by platform-specific implementations of HardwareAbstractionLayer
    AbstractNetworks
    Network interfaces implementation.
    AbstractPowerSource
    A Power Source
    AbstractSensors
    Sensor info.
    AbstractSoundCard
    An abstract Sound Card
    AbstractUsbDevice
    A USB device
    AbstractVirtualMemory
    Virtual Memory info.
